text: If You're Reading This It's Too Late is the fourth mixtape by Canadian rapper Drake. If You're Reading This It's Too Late was released on February 13, 2015. The album was first hinted at in November 2014 by then-Toronto Raptor DeMar DeRozan. The songs "Know Yourself" and "Jungle" were both briefly played in Drake's short movie Jungle. The mixtape did not have any official release date announcement beforehand and was dropped as a surprise. The album debuted at #1 on the Billboard 200, selling 535,000 album-equivalent units. If You're Reading This It's Too Late would be certified 4Ã— Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The album features the singles "Preach" which was released on March 29, 2015 and "Energy" on July 10, 2015. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2015 albums Category:Drake (musician) albums Category:Mixtape albums
title: If You're Reading This It's Too Late
